IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Education for grades 9 through post graduate.
IRS990.MissionDesc: The mission of Hyde Schools is to renew and transform lives through in-depth programs of family-based character education, involving the values of courage, integrity, leadership, curiosity, and concern.
IRS990.Desc: Hyde School was founded to provide a private school education which centers upon individual growth and character development through the teaching of values and courage, integrity, concern for others, leadership and curiousity. Approximately 184 students attended the school in the year ended June 30, 2016.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The intended uses of the Organization's endowment funds are for capital improvements, scholarships, faculty enrichment, and other various purposes that further the Organization's exempt purpose.

Hyde School does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, marital, sexual orientation, or parental status, or handicap in the recruitment and administration of its students; in it faculty or staff; or in its athletic or other school administrative programs or activities. This statement is included in the School's catalog provided to all families inquiring about the School and its staff.
All assistance to individuals is in the form of scholarships and tuition discounts awarded to students of Hyde School.
Laura Gauld received a housing allowance that is included on her Form W-2 as taxable wages.

The amount of bonuses paid to each employee are determined based on multiple factors. The factors include, but are not limited to, the following: employee position in the Organization, employee performance during the year, and the number of hours worked by that employee.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: To build a dormitory on the Bath, ME campus

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.RelationshipDescriptionTxt: Founder and family member of Malcolm Gauld, CEO
Family member of Malcolm Gauld, CEO

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Joseph Werner (Director) and Debbie Werner (Director) have a family relationship. Dana McAvity (Director) and Malcolm McAvity (Director) have a family relationship. Ann S. Bell (Director) and Jonathan A. Bell (Director) have a family relationship. John Stanchina (Director) and Lucinda Stanchina (Director) have a family relationship. Dee Dee Chesley (Director) and Richard Chesley (Director) have a family relationship.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Form 990 is reviewed by the Executive Business Manager and the Finance Committee and a copy of the Form 990 is provided to the governing body for review before it is filed.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The conflict of interest policy and signature page is provided to the Board for review at the June board meeting.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The salary of the CEO and other key employees are determined and approved by the board. The recommendations are specifically made by the Board's Compensation Committee. Periodically Hyde has a compensation analysis performed of key employees. Hyde annually utilizes the surveys from ISANNE (Independent School Association of Northern New England) and NAIS (National Association of Independent Schools). Both surveys provide detailed compensation information of all positions of member schools in addition to key employees. Hyde utilizes the surveys to benchmark all our departments.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization makes its governing documents, conflict of interest policy, and financial statements available to the public upon request.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part X, Line 10: Land, Buildings, and Equipment
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Section 1.263(a)-3(n) Election: Hyde School 616 High Street Bath, ME 04530 EIN 01-6021559 Hyde School is electing to capitalize repair and maintenance costs under Regulation Section 1.263(a)-3(n).602
